extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies that the client can verify the certificate installed on the JSS. This attribute should be used prior to checking the preference "This JSS has a valid certificate installed" in the "JSS/URL Certificate" section of the Management Framework Settings.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/Library/Preferences/com.jamfsoftware.jamf.plist" ]; then validurl=`defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.jamfsoftware.jamf jss_url | grep https://` if [[ $validurl = "" ]]; then echo "<result>Failed - URL did not contain HTTPS</result>" else curlresult=`curl $validurl` if [[ $curlresult = "" ]]; then echo "<result>Failed - curl was unable to connect</result>" else echo "<result>Success</result>" fi fi else echo "<result>Failed - No jamf 7.3 conf file found</result>" fi
